name: Samp RP
description:
Welcome to the world of the Samp RP. Grand Theft Auto style of game with hints of role playing, where player has an open world full of possibilities and his own decisions. Explore the world, drive sport cars, fly helicopters and just do whatever you want.Features:
  • Variety of vehicles
  • Open World
  • World AI
  • Realistic physics
  • Freedom of choice
  • Role Play

Photon Multiplayer will be available during the first second week of January.
